authorCredential.translatedString: American by birth, Canadian by choice.

experience.name: History of the United States of America

authorCredential.description: American by birth, Canadian by choice.

question.title: {"sections": [{"spans": [{"text": "Was there anything in which the Native Americans were more advanced than us?", "modifiers": {}}], "indent": 0, "quoted": false, "type": "plain", "is_rtl": false}]}

answer.content: {"sections": [{"spans": [{"text": "Leaving aside the breathtaking racism and ignorance of the question, yes, there absolutely were.", "modifiers": {}}], "indent": 0, "quoted": false, "type": "plain", "is_rtl": false}, {"spans": [{"text": "The traditional clothing system developed and used by the Inuit is the most effective cold weather clothing developed to date. One of the key elements used by the Inuit is a fur ruff attached to the hood, hem, and cuffs of their parkas. This paper determines why the fur ruff is so critical to the effectiveness of cold-weather clothing, especially in protecting the face", "modifiers": {}}], "indent": 0, "quoted": true, "type": "plain", "is_rtl": false}, {"spans": [{"text": "See for example:", "modifiers": {}}], "indent": 0, "quoted": false, "type": "plain", "is_rtl": false}, {"spans": [{"text": "https://www.researchgate.net/publication/238451618_Effect_of_ancient_Inuit_fur_parka_ruffs_on_facial_heat_transfer", "modifiers": {"link": {"type": "url", "url": "https://www.researchgate.net/publication/238451618_Effect_of_ancient_Inuit_fur_parka_ruffs_on_facial_heat_transfer"}}}], "indent": 0, "quoted": false, "type": "unordered-list", "is_rtl": false}, {"spans": [{"text": "http://www.int-res.com/articles/cr/5/c005p083.pdf", "modifiers": {"link": {"type": "url", "url": "http://www.int-res.com/articles/cr/5/c005p083.pdf"}}}], "indent": 0, "quoted": false, "type": "unordered-list", "is_rtl": false}]}
